typelike.core.infer_type¶

typelike.core.infer_type(anything, itemize=True)[source]¶

Infer the type of anything

Applies some logic to parse anything

Parameters

  • anything (Anything) – Something of whose type we need to infer

  • itemize (bool) – Should we infer the items in lists, tuples? (Default: True)

Returns

Type of anything

Return type

object
